alphabetsoup.userinterface
Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BucketbotGlobalResources, BucketbotManagerExample, BucketbotManagerExample, BucketbotRender, BucketRender, BucketStorageAgent, BucketStorageAgent, EconomyRender, EconomyRender, LetterStationRender, MapRender, SituatedMarketRender, SituatedMarketRender, WaypointGraphRender, WordListRender, WordStationRender
public interface Renderable

Interface which must be extended for an entity to be rendered to the screen.

Author:
Chris Hazard

Method Summary
 boolean isMouseOver(float mouse_x, float mouse_y)
          isMouseOver is used to see whether the mouse cursor is over an object for selection and displaying details
 void render()
          Renders the object to the screen.
 void renderDetails()
          Renders details of the object to a pre-translated location
 void renderOverlayDetails()
          Renders details of the object next to or over the object

isMouseOver

boolean isMouseOver(float mouse_x,
                    float mouse_y)
isMouseOver is used to see whether the mouse cursor is over an object for selection and displaying details

Parameters:
mouse_x - X position of mouse cursor in object space
mouse_y - X position of mouse cursor in object space
Returns:
Return true if the mouse is over the object, false otherwise
